DataElement.preferredName: Patient Personal Medical History Veno-Occlusive Disease Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating the patient meets the eligibility requirements for participation in a clinical trial with regards to having a history of veno-occlusive disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Personal Medical History Veno-Occlusive Disease Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._Disorder in which veins are partially or completely obstructed or the blood flow through the veins is suboptimal.--2004_The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Personal Medical History Veno-Occlusive Disease Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:Disorder in which veins are partially or completely obstructed or the blood flow through the veins is suboptimal.--2004:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.
Disorder in which veins are partially or completely obstructed or the blood flow through the veins is suboptimal.--2004
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of veno-occlusive disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have prior history of Grade 4 VOD/SOS (veno-occlusive disease/sinusoidal obstructive syndrome) or any history of Grade 3 VOD/SOS that, at the discretion of the treating physician, places the patient at unacceptably high risk for future severe VOD/SOS?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of hepatic sinusoid obstructive syndrome (veno-occlusive disease) within the prior 3 months?
